--- title: "2021-12: Passage Pathing" format: html --- ::: {.cell hash='2021-12_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_34e6827cccbcad4c1c2da978a008e1f1'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(stringr) library(unglue) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ── ✔ ggplot2 3.4.0 ✔ purrr 0.3.5 ✔ tibble 3.1.8 ✔ dplyr 1.0.10 ✔ tidyr 1.2.1 ✔ forcats 0.5.2 ✔ readr 2.1.3 ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(data.table) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'data.table' The following objects are masked from 'package:dplyr': between, first, last The following object is masked from 'package:purrr': transpose ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} dt <- readLines("input2.txt") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning in readLines("input2.txt"): incomplete final line found on 'input2.txt' ``` ::: ::: ## Part 1 ::: {.cell hash='2021-12_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_637eee86a8c59781e36171ac9279d051'} ```{.r .cell-code} paste0(c("graph LR", dt), collapse = "\n") |> str_replace_all("-", "-->") |> str_replace_all("end", "finish") |> DiagrammeR::mermaid() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} str_split(dt, "-", simplify = TRUE) |> data.frame() |> `colnames<-`(c("start", "finish")) |> mutate(finish = ifelse(finish == "end", "finish", finish)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` start finish 1 start A 2 start b 3 A c 4 A b 5 b d 6 A finish 7 b finish ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} combn(dt, m = 2) |> t() |> data.frame() |> separate(X1, c("xStart", "xFinish")) |> separate(X2, c("yFinish", "yStart")) |> filter(xStart == yFinish | yStart == xFinish) |> unique() |> pivot_longer(cols = c(ends_with("Start"), ends_with("Finish"))) |> unique() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 13 × 2 name value 1 xStart start 2 yStart b 3 xFinish A 4 yFinish start 5 xFinish b 6 yFinish A 7 xStart A 8 xFinish c 9 yStart end 10 xStart b 11 xFinish d 12 yFinish b 13 xFinish end ``` ::: :::
